jobTitle: Freight Forwarding Outside Sales (Turkey US trade lane)
description:
Great career opportunity: a large international freight forwarding company is growing their Sales team. They are looking for candidates with relevant Sales experience in international freight forwarding focused on Turkey & US trade lane. US imports from Turkey. Someone who has book of business in ocean/air import in Turkey & US trade lane. Preferrably someone who can speak Mandarin. Candidate must be located in the US (LA or NY/NJ).

Requirements: someone who has over 2 years experience with other freight forwarding companies like: Hecny Group, Top Ocean, Morrison Express, Apex, Lauffer, KN, Express International, DSV, Toll Group, CH Robinson, OEC, DB Schenker, DHL Global Forwarding.

Company has a supportive leadership team & offers great compensation. Base salary $60K-$120K/year + 20% commission.

Hybrid position, candidates need to be in LA or NY/NJ

Apply today to be part of a growing organization & the team.
